section.title: What is changed?
section.para: You can find some changes on core components of Pardus &PRODVER;, for other addtional changes please see this http://cd-stats.

listitem.para: NetworkManager - NetworkManager is updated to &NMVER;. - Handle WLAN security passwords gracefully while upgrading distribution.

ModemManager - ModemManager is updated to &MMVER;. - Improvements for Samsung modems - Support access technology reporting for Qualcomm Gobi modems - Fix communication with Nokia N900 devices - Support multiple CDMA Rm protocols - Fix handling of Option access technology reporting - Fix handling of CDMA EVDO registration states - Fix problems reconnecting Ericsson F5521gw modems - Better handling of some Android handset modem
hal - Hal is updated to &HALVER; D-Bus activation fixed and it is used on start-up.
